text: Adorable Julia (German: Julia, Du bist zauberhaft) is a 1962 Austrian French German comedy movie directed by Alfred Weidenmann and was based on the 1937 novel Theatre by W. Somerset Maugham and was turned into a play by Guy Bolton. It stars Lilli Palmer, Charles Boyer, Jean Sorel, Jeanne Valérie, Ljuba Welitsch, Tilly Lauenstein, Charles Régnier, Thomas Fritsch, Fritz Weiss, Herbert Fux. ==Other websites== * * Category:1962 comedy movies Category:Austrian comedy movies Category:French comedy movies Category:German comedy movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Alfred Weidenmann
title: Adorable Julia
